info.title: Koupii LMS API
info.description: API documentation for English course LMS

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token
Revokes the user's current access token

get.description: Redirects the user to Google's OAuth consent screen
Handles the callback from Google OAuth and authenticates the user
Redirects the user to Facebook's OAuth consent screen
Handles the callback from Facebook OAuth and authenticates the user

post.description: Registers a user and returns an access token

get.description: Admin & Student can see all classes, Teacher can only see their own classes.

post.description: Only admin and teacher can create a new class.

409.description: Class name or code already exists

get.description: Get class detail including teacher info.

post.description: Only admin and teacher (class owner) can update class data.

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

409.description: Class name or code already exists

delete.description: Only admin and teacher (class owner) can delete a class.

get.summary: Get all enrollments based on user role
get.description: Admin sees all enrollments, teacher sees only enrollments in their classes, student sees only their enrolled classes.

post.description: Student enrolls to a class using class_id and class_code.

422.description: Invalid class code or validation error

get.description: Show enrollment details including class and student info.

patch.description: Admin, teacher, or student can update enrollment (depends on role).

delete.description: Admin, teacher, or student can delete enrollment based on role authorization.

get.summary: Get all invitations based on user role
get.description: Admin sees all invitations, teacher sees only invitations in their classes, student sees only invitations sent to them.

post.description: Teacher or admin sends an invitation to a student to join a class.

409.description: Student already enrolled or invitation already sent

patch.description: Student accepts the invitation to join a class.

403.description: Unauthorized - You can only accept your own invitations

patch.description: Student declines the invitation to join a class.

403.description: Unauthorized - You can only decline your own invitations

patch.description: Teacher or admin updates invitation details (e.g., change email if wrong person was invited).

403.description: Unauthorized - You can only update invitations for your own classes

409.description: Student already enrolled or invitation already sent

delete.description: Teacher or admin deletes the invitation before it is accepted or declined.

get.description: Retrieve listening tests based on user role. Admin sees all tests, students see only published tests, teachers see only their own tests.

post.description: Create a new listening test with audio segments and questions.

instructions.example: Listen carefully and answer the questions

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific listening test including audio segments and questions.

put.description: Update an existing listening test. Only test creator or admin can update.

delete.description: Delete a listening test and all related data. Only test creator or admin can delete.

patch.summary: Toggle publish status of a listening test
patch.description: Toggle the published status of a listening test. Only test creator or admin can perform this action.

get.description: Search listening tests based on various criteria.
Retrieve student answers for listening questions

post.description: Submit an answer for a specific listening question

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific listening answer
Get listening task assignments for student with status and progress
Get listening task assignments and submissions for teacher overview

get.summary: Get listening task detail for student
get.description: Get detailed listening task with audio and questions for student attempt

get.summary: Get listening test results with explanations
get.description: Get listening test results with audio segments and vocabulary discovery

vocabulary_discovered.description: New vocabulary words discovered from this listening

get.description: Retrieve reviews for listening submissions

post.description: Create a review for a listening submission

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific listening review
Retrieve listening task assignments based on user role

post.description: Assign a listening task to a class

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific listening assignment
Retrieve listening tasks based on user role - Admin sees all, Teacher sees own tasks, Student sees assigned published tasks

post.description: Create a new listening task with audio and questions

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific listening task

delete.description: Delete a listening task and all related data

get.description: Retrieve vocabulary words discovered or learned from listening tasks

post.description: Add or discover new vocabulary from a listening task

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific vocabulary entry

delete.description: Remove a vocabulary entry from listening vocabulary bank

post.description: Submit student's answer for a specific question in the reading test

answer.description: Student's answer (format depends on question type)

oneOf.description: For single choice, text completion, true/false

post.description: Submit all answers and complete the reading test

time_taken_seconds.description: Total time taken for the test

get.description: Retrieve test results including highlights and explanations for completed tests
Retrieve reading dashboard data for students
Retrieve reading dashboard data for teachers
Retrieve detailed analytics for reading tests
Retrieve reviews for reading test submissions

post.description: Create a review for a reading test submission

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific reading review

get.summary: Get submissions for a reading task
get.description: Retrieve all submissions for a specific reading task (Teacher view)

post.description: Submit answers for a reading test (Student only) - Supports all 15 Question Types

requestBody.description: Reading test answers for 15 Question Types: QT1-Multiple Choice, QT2-Multiple Answer, QT3-True/False/Not Given, QT4-Matching Heading, QT5-Sentence Completion, QT6-Paragraph/Summary Completion, QT7-Yes/No/Not Given, QT8-Matching Information, QT9-Matching Features, QT10-Matching Sentence Ending, QT11-Note Completion, QT12-Table Completion, QT13-Flowchart Completion, QT14-Diagram Label Completion, QT15-Short Answer Question

answers.description: Array of answers for each question

time_taken_seconds.description: Total time taken to complete the test

403.description: Forbidden - Student only or assignment not available

get.description: Get detailed submission with answers and grading information

post.description: Start a new attempt for reading test retake

get.description: Get reading task assignments for teachers and students

post.description: Assign a reading task to a class (Teacher only)

message.example: Reading task assigned to class successfully

get.description: Retrieve reading tasks based on user role - Admin sees all, Teacher sees own tasks, Student sees assigned published tasks

post.description: Create a new reading task with passage and questions (15 Question Types supported)

description.example: Practice test for IELTS reading section

instructions.example: Read the passage and answer all questions

questions.description: Supports 15 Reading Question Types: QT1-Multiple Choice, QT2-Multiple Answer, QT3-True/False/Not Given, QT4-Matching Heading, QT5-Sentence Completion, QT6-Paragraph/Summary Completion, QT7-Yes/No/Not Given, QT8-Matching Information, QT9-Matching Features, QT10-Matching Sentence Ending, QT11-Note Completion, QT12-Table Completion, QT13-Flowchart Completion, QT14-Diagram Label Completion, QT15-Short Answer Question

get.description: Retrieve reading tests based on user role. Admin sees all tests, students see only published tests, teachers see only their own tests.

post.description: Create a new reading test with passages and questions.

get.description: Retrieve a specific reading test with all its passages and questions.

404.description: Test not found or unauthorized access

put.description: Update an existing reading test. Only the creator or admin can update.

delete.description: Delete a specific passage from a reading test.
Delete a specific question from a reading test. May also delete the question group if it becomes empty.
Delete an entire reading test including all passages, questions, and associated images. Only the creator or admin can delete.

get.description: Retrieve vocabularies discovered from a completed reading test

post.description: Save a discovered vocabulary word to the student's personal vocabulary bank

400.description: Bad request - Vocabulary not discovered or already saved

get.description: Retrieve the student's personal vocabulary bank with filtering options

post.description: Record a vocabulary practice session

400.description: Bad request - Vocabulary not in your bank

get.description: Get speaking assignments for student dashboard
Get speaking assignments for teacher dashboard
Retrieve speaking tasks based on user role

patch.description: Change the authenticated user's password. Requires the current password and a new one. CSRF protection via XSRF-TOKEN and Referer header.

new_password: The new password must be at least 8 characters.

get.description: Retrieve profile information for the authenticated user.
Retrieve public details of a user by their ID.

post.description: Update authenticated user's profile including name, email, role, avatar, and bio.

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's account, including avatar file if present.

get.description: Returns a list of all vocabulary categories.

post.description: Adds a new vocabulary category. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category by its ID.

delete.description: Delete a category by its UUID.

patch.description: Update a vocabulary category's name or description.

get.description: Returns a list of all vocabulary entries.

post.description: Adds a new vocabulary entry to the system.

get.description: Retrieve details of a vocabulary entry by its ID.

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

delete.description: Deletes a vocabulary entry by its UUID.

post.description: Toggle the bookmark status of a vocabulary entry for the authenticated user.

get.description: Retrieve dashboard data for students
Retrieve dashboard data for teachers
Retrieve dashboard data for admins

post.description: Provide feedback and score for a student's writing submission

comments.example: Good structure but needs improvement in grammar

suggestions.example: Try to vary your sentence structure more

get.description: Retrieve submissions that need to be reviewed by the teacher

post.description: Review multiple submissions at once

get.description: Retrieve all submissions for a specific writing task (Teacher view)

post.description: Submit a writing assignment (Student only)
Auto-save draft functionality (Student only)
Create a retake submission with specified retake option

patch.description: Student acknowledges review and marks submission as done

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific submission
Retrieve all classroom assignments for a specific task

post.description: Assign a writing task to multiple classrooms (Teacher/Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a writing task assignment from a specific classroom

get.description: Retrieve writing tasks based on user role - Admin sees all, Teacher sees own tasks, Student sees assigned published tasks

post.description: Create a new writing task with questions and assignments

description.example: Write a 500-word essay about climate change

instructions.example: Follow the essay structure: introduction, body, conclusion

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific writing task with submissions and assignments

404.description: Task not found or unauthorized access

put.description: Update an existing writing task details

delete.description: Delete a writing task and all associated data

get.description: Retrieve writing tests based on user role. Admin sees all tests, students see only published tests, teachers see only their own tests.

post.description: Create a new writing test with prompts and settings.

instructions.example: Write your response clearly and coherently

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific writing test including prompts.

put.description: Update an existing writing test. Only test creator or admin can update.

delete.description: Delete a writing test and all related data. Only test creator or admin can delete.

patch.summary: Toggle publish status of a writing test
patch.description: Toggle the published status of a writing test. Only test creator or admin can perform this action.

get.description: Search writing tests based on various criteria.
